rows.label: qst006104_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, isn't this a
Rigiderian stone tablet?

rows.label: qst006104_msg0003
rows.name:
Hmm, what a strangely shaped stone
tablet. What's written on it?

rows.label: qst006104_msg0004
rows.name: Well then, let's read it right away.

rows.label: qst006104_msg0005
rows.name:
The Kingdom of Rigideria was sunk in a single
night, along with its Divine Beast, by the
appearance of the demon beast, Arrogant Behemoth...

rows.label: qst006104_msg0007
rows.name:
That Arrogant Behemoth must
be an incredible monster.

rows.label: qst006104_msg0010
rows.name:
How dare a mere monster
do this to my kingdom...

rows.label: qst006104_msg0011
rows.name:
My retainers! Find the scoundrel
who destroyed my country!

rows.label: qst006104_msg0012
rows.name:
Hey, even if we search, it was
hundreds of years ago. Who knows
if it's even still alive?

rows.label: qst006104_msg0013
rows.name:
But if we know its name, we might be
able to track it down by following
local legends and gathering sightings.

rows.label: qst006104_msg0014
rows.name:
Let's rely on the power of
the mercenaries this time.

rows.label: qst006104_msg0015
rows.name:
You're right. That seems like
the fastest way to settle this.

rows.label: qst006104_msg0016
rows.name: Alright, then let us begin at once!
